entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
